arts.ttl: Napoli Official Talks Renewals and Osimhen Joining PSG
arts.sum: Napoli director Giovanni Manna provided an update on the ongoing negotiations at Napoli before his team was eliminated by Lazio in the Coppa Italia: “We’re in a work in progress because we changed a lot, including the coach." arts.ttl: Manuel Lazzari Insists Lazio Never Lost Self-Belief, Lauds Ex Chelsea Star: “Role Model”
arts.sum: Lazio full-back Manuel Lazzari revels in the Coppa Italia victory over Napoli, noting how he and his teammates kept believing in themselves despite the agonizing defeat against Parma last weekend. arts.ttl: Tijjani Noslin’s Hat-trick Stuns Napoli as Lazio Progress to Coppa Italia Quarter Finals
arts.sum: Lazio have booked their place in the Coppa Italia quarter-finals at the expense of their visitors thanks to a remarkable display from Tijjani Noslin. The Lineup The Dutchman spearheaded a rotated 4-2-3-1 formation, with Loum Tchaouna, Pedro and Mattia Zaccagni acting as his support crew, while Nicolo Rovella and Fisayo Dele-Bashiru started in the double-pivot.
